parameters.name: arn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the NotificationEvent to return.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the resource.

nested_items.name: notificationConfigurationArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the NotificationConfiguration.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The creation time of the NotificationEvent.

nested_items.name: schemaVersion
nested_items.description: The schema version of the Notification Event.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for a NotificationEvent.

nested_items.name: sourceEventMetadata
nested_items.description: The source event metadata.

nested_items.name: eventTypeVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the type of event.

nested_items.name: sourceEventId
nested_items.description: The source event id.

nested_items.name: eventOriginRegion
nested_items.description: The Region the event originated from.

nested_items.name: relatedAccount
nested_items.description: The primary Amazon Web Services account of SourceEvent.

nested_items.name: source
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services service the event originates from. For example aws.cloudwatch.

nested_items.name: eventOccurrenceTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the source event occurred. This is based on the Source Event.

nested_items.name: eventType
nested_items.description: The type of event. For example, an Amazon CloudWatch state change.

nested_items.name: relatedResources
nested_items.description: A list of resources related to this NotificationEvent.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the resource.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource. At least one id or ARN is required.

nested_items.name: detailUrl
nested_items.description: The URL to the resource's detail page. If a detail page URL is unavailable, it is the URL to an informational page that describes the resource's type.

nested_items.name: tags
nested_items.description: A map of tags assigned to a resource. A tag is a string-to-string map of key-value pairs.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: messageComponents
nested_items.description: Describes the components of a notification message.

nested_items.name: headline
nested_items.description: A sentence long summary. For example, titles or an email subject line.

nested_items.name: paragraphSummary
nested_items.description: A paragraph long or multiple sentence summary. For example, Chatbot notifications.

nested_items.name: completeDescription
nested_items.description: A complete summary with all possible relevant information.

nested_items.name: dimensions
nested_items.description: A list of properties in key-value pairs. Pairs are shown in order of importance from most important to least important. Channels may limit the number of dimensions shown to the notification viewer.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the dimension.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value of the dimension.

nested_items.name: sourceEventDetailUrl
nested_items.description: The source event URL.

nested_items.name: sourceEventDetailUrlDisplayText
nested_items.description: The detailed URL for the source event.

nested_items.name: notificationType
nested_items.description: The type of event causing the notification.
Values:
ALERT.
A notification about an event where something was triggered, initiated, reopened, deployed, or a threshold was breached.
WARNING.
A notification about an event where an issue is about to arise. For example, something is approaching a threshold.
ANNOUNCEMENT.
A notification about an important event. For example, a step in a workflow or escalation path or that a workflow was updated.
INFORMATIONAL.
A notification about informational messages. For example, recommendations, service announcements, or reminders.

nested_items.name: eventStatus
nested_items.description: The assessed nature of the event.
Values:
HEALTHY.
All EventRules are ACTIVE and any call can be run.
UNHEALTHY.
Some EventRules are ACTIVE and some are INACTIVE. Any call can be run.

nested_items.name: aggregationEventType
nested_items.description: The aggregation type of the NotificationConfiguration.
Values:
AGGREGATE.
The notification event is an aggregate notification. Aggregate notifications summarize grouped events over a specified time period.
CHILD.
Some EventRules are ACTIVE and some are INACTIVE. Any call can be run.
NONE.
The notification isn't aggregated.

nested_items.name: aggregateNotificationEventArn
nested_items.description: If the value of aggregationEventType is not NONE, this is the Amazon Resource Event (ARN) of the parent aggregate notification.

nested_items.name: aggregationSummary
nested_items.description: Provides additional information about how multiple notifications are grouped.

nested_items.name: eventCount
nested_items.description: Indicates the number of events associated with the aggregation key.

nested_items.name: aggregatedBy
nested_items.description: Indicates the criteria or rules by which notifications have been grouped together.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: Indicates the type of aggregation key.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: Indicates the value associated with the aggregation key name.

nested_items.name: aggregatedAccounts
nested_items.description: Indicates the Amazon Web Services accounts in the aggregation key.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: Name of the summarization dimension.

nested_items.name: count
nested_items.description: Total number of occurrences for this dimension.

nested_items.name: sampleValues
nested_items.description: Indicates the sample values found within the dimension.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: aggregatedRegions
nested_items.description: Indicates the Amazon Web Services Regions in the aggregation key.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: Name of the summarization dimension.

nested_items.name: count
nested_items.description: Total number of occurrences for this dimension.

nested_items.name: sampleValues
nested_items.description: Indicates the sample values found within the dimension.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: aggregatedOrganizationalUnits
nested_items.description: Indicates the collection of organizational units that are involved in the aggregation key.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: Name of the summarization dimension.

nested_items.name: count
nested_items.description: Total number of occurrences for this dimension.

nested_items.name: sampleValues
nested_items.description: Indicates the sample values found within the dimension.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: additionalSummarizationDimensions
nested_items.description: List of additional dimensions used to group and summarize data.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: Name of the summarization dimension.

nested_items.name: count
nested_items.description: Total number of occurrences for this dimension.

nested_items.name: sampleValues
nested_items.description: Indicates the sample values found within the dimension.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: startTime
nested_items.description: The notification event start time.

nested_items.name: endTime
nested_items.description: The end time of the event.

nested_items.name: textParts
nested_items.description: A list of text values.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of text part. Determines the usage of all other fields and whether or not they're required.

nested_items.name: displayText
nested_items.description: A short single line description of the link. Must be hyper-linked with the URL itself.

nested_items.name: textByLocale
nested_items.description: A map of locales to the text in that locale.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: url
nested_items.description: The URL itself.

nested_items.name: media
nested_items.description: A list of media elements.

nested_items.name: mediaId
nested_items.description: The unique ID for the media.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of media.

nested_items.name: url
nested_items.description: The URL of the media.

nested_items.name: caption
nested_items.description: The caption of the media.
